Package us.ullberg.startpunkt.objects.kubernetes

Class IstioVirtualServiceApplicationWrapper

java.lang.Object
us.ullberg.startpunkt.objects.kubernetes.BaseKubernetesObject
us.ullberg.startpunkt.objects.kubernetes.AnnotatedKubernetesObject
us.ullberg.startpunkt.objects.kubernetes.IstioVirtualServiceApplicationWrapper
All Implemented Interfaces:
KubernetesObject
public class IstioVirtualServiceApplicationWrapper extends AnnotatedKubernetesObject
Wrapper for Istio VirtualService custom resources to extract application info. Supports filtering to only annotated VirtualServices if specified.

    • IstioVirtualServiceApplicationWrapper

      public IstioVirtualServiceApplicationWrapper(boolean onlyAnnotated, String defaultProtocol)
      Constructs an IstioVirtualServiceApplicationWrapper.
      Parameters:
      onlyAnnotated - if true, only annotated VirtualServices will be processed
      defaultProtocol - default protocol to use if not specified in the resource

    • getApplicationSpecs

      public List<ApplicationSpec> getApplicationSpecs(io.fabric8.kubernetes.client.KubernetesClient client, boolean anyNamespace, List<String> matchNames)
      Description copied from class: BaseKubernetesObject
      Retrieves application specifications by mapping Kubernetes generic resources.
      Specified by:
      getApplicationSpecs in interface KubernetesObject
      Overrides:
      getApplicationSpecs in class BaseKubernetesObject
      Parameters:
      client - the Kubernetes client instance
      anyNamespace - whether to search across all namespaces
